item.title: Opening Firefox Via the webbrowser Module + RPA Tools
item.description:
<!-- wp:paragraph -->

webbrowser is a convenient Python standard library module. It opened my Firefox browser on my Ubuntu Linux operating system running on a Chromebook. This code is adapted from a Python Examples blog post. Below is a list of other browsers you can open with webbrowser. At the bottom â€¦
